## 768. BLOW (V, OF PERSON)
### Definition
Most basic verb for action of expelling air with force from the mouth. Avoid intransitive forms, such as the wind blowing. Avoid also blow in the sense of "hit". (CoBL)

### Contexts
1. He blew on the sticks to start a fire. (CoBL) 2. He blew on tea to make it colder.
